name: Cookie thief
description:
Hoi there! Nice to have someone check in :D

This is a little prototype of a grappling hook, inspired by games like "getting over it" with their really weird ways of moving about. It's not much, but it's a nice little test, and is good enough for a few minutes of fun! Also there are cookies. 

Be aware that changing the window size messes up the game, I'm sorry about this!
